content: Are you waterin' the plants, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>? {A想象}If we had a few more watering buckets, we could mix different nutrients and fertilizers.

content: {A沉醉闻}I tasted the air, and noticed the humidity around here had risen. Then sure enough, there you are, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, watering plants.
